name: com.awesomusrex.rex-core
description:
Collection of many essential tools that are used in ganmes produced by Awesomus Rex. 
	
		This package's features:
		- an eternal object
		- transformables
		- early and late recorders
		- PRO overrides
		- Renter class
		- SceneControl script
		- GameSettings and GameEditorSettings template
		- tag support
